title: An Easy Victory (Part 1)
body:
An Easy Victory (Part 1)

Desert sky eagle has a skill called hawk's eye, with this skill it can easily see everything within five kilometres of the area.

And using the share senses skill Evan can also see everything that the eagle was seeing.

With the combination of these two skills, he easily found the location of thornbloom monsters.

Evan summoned back all of his shadow undead inside his shadow storage and flew up into the sky. 

After three minutes of flying, he landed on the red rock mountain and looked at the giant canyon before him. 

The canyon was very big and stretched deeper into the red rock mountain. 

"So they are the famous thornblooms of the verdant wilds dungeon desert" Evan muttered after taking a proper look at the monsters inside the canyon.
